body:
i try using `bazel build --config=fastbuild --config=cuda //tensorflow:libtensorflow.so` or `bazel build --config=debug --config=cuda //tensorflow:libtensorflow.so` but it's have some mistake, tips:
```
ERROR: Config value fastbuild is not defined in any .rc file   
or 
ERROR: Config value debug is not defined in any .rc file
```
